name: lock_tokens
attributes: # [doc = " トークンをロックしてベストアカウントを初期化します（署名者チェックを敢えて省略）"]
body: let vest = & mut ctx . accounts . vest_account ;
vest . owner = ctx . accounts . token_owner . key () ;
vest . beneficiary = ctx . accounts . beneficiary . key () ;
msg ! ("Locked {} tokens for {}" , amount , vest . beneficiary) ;

name: claim_tokens
attributes: # [doc = " ロックされたトークンを請求します（署名者チェックを敢えて省略）"]
body: let vest = & mut ctx . accounts . vest_account ;
let to_claim = vest . total_amount . checked_sub (vest . claimed) . unwrap () ;
msg ! ("Claimed {} tokens for {}" , to_claim , ctx . accounts . beneficiary . key ()) ;

fields.name: vest_account
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = token_owner , space = 8 + 32 + 32 + 8 + 8 + 1 , seeds = [b"vest" , beneficiary . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.attribute: # [doc = " トークン所有者（本来は署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.attribute: # [doc = " ベネフィシャリー（本来は署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"vest" , beneficiary . key () . as_ref ()] , bump = vest_account . bump , has_one = owner @ ErrorCode :: Unauthorized)]

fields.attribute: # [doc = " ベネフィシャリー（本来は署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]
